title: Document a Universe of Packages
text: Tidyverse popularized idea “universe packages.” typical universe meta-package centralizes access functions data across packages. example, library(tidyverse) tidyverse meta-package centralizes access functions dplyr, ggplot2, several packages Tidyverse universe. However, meta-packages typically don’t centralize documentation. example, tidyverse website shows documentation tidyverse meta-package show documentation dplyr, ggplot2, packages Tidyverse. dverse package solves problem. creates data frame containing metadata associated documentation set packages. data frame can easily used generate universe-wide reference meta-package website, example using pkgdown.

title: Document a Universe of Packages
text: document_universe() creates data frame documentation metadata one packages. url_template can take different templates manual vignettes. knitr::kable() turns URLs clickable links. DT::datatabe() also provides search box.
